top.title: Trump claims US oil firms could be 'up and running' in Venezuela within 18 months
top.summary: Trump is open about his ambitions for scaled-up US operations, but analysts say such plans would take time.

top.title: Macron hosts Ukraine and allies to try to cement security guarantees
top.summary: The talks are held as Russia continues attacking Ukraine's energy sector and under the shadow of US threats to annex Greenland.

top.title: Trump aide says no-one would fight US over Greenland
top.summary: Seven European countries have issued a joint statement saying only Greenland and Denmark can decide on their future.

top.title: Nvidia unveils self-driving car tech as it seeks to power more products with AI
top.summary: The chip giant is looking for ways to move the AI revolution beyond software and into physical products.

top.title: Ofcom asks X about reports its Grok AI makes sexualised images of children
top.summary: Elon Musk's social media platform has warned users not to use Grok to generate illegal content.

top.title: Car giant Hyundai to use human-like robots in factories
top.summary: The firm plans to deploy the technology at the same plant that was involved in a huge immigration raid in 2025.

title.#text: Ugreen is expanding into AI-powered smart home surveillance
Chamberlain’s new smart lock will lock your door and shut your garage upon spotting a stranger
Ugreen is now selling an AI NAS with more RAM than my desktop
